We want to hear from you!
Please reach out with any questions or concerns. We’re here to help.
Please use the form to help us best serve you. Thank you!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Hidden element
Do you offer Happy Hour?
Yes! We offer Happy Hour everyday from 3:00pm to 6:00pm. Our Happy Hour specials include $1 off bottle, beer $1.50 off draft beer and $2 off house wine & well liquor.
Do you offer Brunch?
Yes, we offer brunch on Saturdays and Sundays from 10:00am to 3:00pm. Guests can enjoy savory and sweet brunch favorites and $18 bottomless mimosas.
Where can I see your Live Music line up?
We host Live Music here at the Sandbar every week! To see our upcoming performances, please visit us on
Facebook
!
How can I get booked to play at Sandbar Amelia Island?
Are you a performer looking to come play on Amelia Island? Please contact us directly at
events@thesandbarandkitchen.com
.
How can I make a reservation?
To make a reservation, please call the restaurant directly at (904) 310-3648.
How can I host an event at Sandbar Amelia Island?
To inquire about hosting an event with us, please contact us by filling out the form on our
Events
page.
Do you offer Catering?
Yes, we offer catering both on premise and delivery. To learn more about your catering options with us, please call us directly at (904) 310-3648 or email us at
events@thesandbarandkitchen.com
.
What is the Whiskey Library?
With over 1200+ selections, we are the home of the largest Whiskey collection in Florida. View our whiskey library
here.
Where are you located?
Sandbar Amelia Island is located directly on the beach on Amelia Island. Get directions
here.
Contact Information
To contact Sandbar, please give us a call at (904) 310-3648 or email us at
marketing@thesandbarandkitchen.com
.

Celebrate on the beach
Whether you’re looking to host an event or just get together with friends, we are excited to be a part of your next occasion! With a large upstairs dining area, we are the perfect space to spend your next birthday party, wedding welcome party, retirement party and more. We can’t wait to create a memorable experience for you and your guests.
